name: Space Blaster! (danielzrull)
description:
This is my submission for the completed version of the 2D shooter (Project 2). Modifications made include:

Three unique levels and one “boss fight” level.

An original music track (composed by me, using beepbox.co) for the game’s main menu.

Sound effect implementation for UI elements.

Additional UI element with instructions on how to complete the current level.

Full instructions screen with controls and “how to play.”

Created by Daniel Zrull
